data.name: Larger Airfields
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
[h2]Larger Airfields[/h2]
Island airfields now have a longer runway, one that you can realistically land on (briefly) with a Manta or Albatross.
Airfields also gain a Helipad and a storage building.
The mod is purely cosmetic, but may provide some more fun in ground combat.
